Personal Representative.definition: one recognized as the representative of another party or his or her interests ;specif
Personal Representative.origin: [when a person who has brought an action for personal injury dies pending the action, such action may be revived in the name of his personal representative " Code of Virginia "]

1.1: one recognized as the representative of another party or his or her interests

2.1: an executor or administrator who may bring or be subject to an action or proceeding for or against a deceased person and his or her estate [when a person who has brought an action for personal injury dies pending the action, such action may be revived in the name of his
